segments.text: I see the woman standing in the water, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in a trance, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what's going through her mind, so oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad for her, so absorbed in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are right there, making a mess, and she doesn't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she might be really tired or something, to not notice all this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of it soon, before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so full of contrasts, it's intriguing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing her like this, so out of touch with her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR
